title: Lab Aide: BIO 181 (FWS Eligible) Student Worker III
purpose: To assist in reviewing Dreamscape Learn activity for errors and ensuring the functionality of lecture materials and course content. Additionally, to provide support during office hours and assist with student recruitment.
required_qualifications: Significant amount of specialized training or experience
preferred_qualifications: Has been an ATA in Fall B Bio 181 online with Deanna Larson

company_info.overview: Arizona State University is a new model for American higher education, combining academic excellence, entrepreneurial energy, and broad access. It comprises four differentiated campuses and serves more than 100,000 students in metropolitan Phoenix, Arizona. ASU champions intellectual and cultural diversity and is committed to being a tobacco-free university.
company_info.mission: To positively impact the economic, social, cultural, and environmental health of the communities it serves through innovative and interdisciplinary research and education.
company_info.values: ASU values intellectual and cultural diversity and provides equal opportunities for all applicants, regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other basis protected by law.
